name: Wild Dino Shooting 3D
description:
Wild Dino Shooting 3D is best game with ancient to modern weapons in beautiful 3D real world with green plants.Feel Realistic world dinosaur hunter in this dinosaurs games.
Features:

3D Graphics
Realistic Environment.
Many challenging missions.
Huge 3D map.
Addictive Gameplay.
Amazing jungle sound effects.
Efficient controls.
